description: Try our easy to follow Goan Pork Vindaloo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Goan Pork Vindaloo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 625g boneless pork, cut into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Make the spice paste by placing the cumin seeds, dried chilies, cardamom seeds, cinnamon stick, peppercorns, garlic, and vinegar into a small food processor and processing into a smooth paste. Place the pork in a nonmetallic dish and pour over the paste. Rub into the pork, cover, and marinate in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours.

Heat the oil in a large, heavy saucepan and add the onion. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, then add the curry powder and the pork. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes and then stir in the potatoes, tomato paste, sugar, chopped tomatoes, and stock.
Season well and bring to a boil. Cover tightly and reduce the heat to low. Gently simmer for 1 1/2 hours or until the pork is tender.
Garnish with chopped fresh coriander and serve immediately with steamed white rice.
